verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> entered1525, 846 <S%G2596>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G5620>that<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that were <S%G544>disobedient<s%> stirred <S%G1892>up<s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2559>made<s%> them evil <S%G2559>affected<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

Long <S%G2425><s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> therefore3767, Ezekiel3 <S%G1304>they<s%> tarried there speaking <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, who bare <S%G3140>witness<s%> unto the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1325>granting<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%> to be <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4977>divided<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> part <S%G2258>held<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> part <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3303>apostles<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> an <S%G3730>onset<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%>, to treat them <S%G5195>shamefully<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3036>stone<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>,

they became aware <S%G4894>of<s%> <S%G2703>it<s%>, and fled <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G3071>Lycaonia<s%>, <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the region round <S%G4066>about<s%>:
and <S%G2546>there<s%> they preached the <S%G2258>gospel<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> there <S%G2521>sat<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%>, <S%G102>impotent<s%> in <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>, a <S%G5560>cripple<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%>'s <S%G2836>womb<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> had <S%G4043>walked<s%>.

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%>, fastening <S%G816>eyes<s%> upon <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> to be made <S%G4982>whole<s%>,

said <S%G2036><s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G450>Stand<s%> <S%G3717>upright<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G242>leaped<s%> up <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1492>when<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%>, they lifted <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> in the speech of <S%G3072>Lycaonia<s%>, The <S%G2316>gods<s%> are come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> in the <S%G3666>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> they <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, <S%G2203>Jupiter<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2060>Mercury<s%>, <S%G1894>because<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> the <S%G2233>chief<s%> <S%G3303>speaker<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2409>priest<s%> of <S%G2203>Jupiter<s%> whose temple <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G5022>oxen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4725>garlands<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> the <S%G4440>gates<s%>, and would <S%G2309>have<s%> done <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%>.

But <S%G191>when<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%>, <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G1284>it<s%>, they rent <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>, and sprang <S%G1530>forth<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, crying <S%G1161>out<s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G435>Sirs<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> do <S%G4160>ye<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>? <S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of like <S%G3663>passions<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%>, and <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> good <S%G1994>tidings<s%>, that ye should turn <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> vain <S%G3152>things<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that in them <S%G846>is<s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> gone <S%G3944>by<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> to walk <S%G4198>in<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>.

And <S%G2544><s%> <S%G1065>yet<s%> He <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> without <S%G267>witness<s%>, in that he did <S%G15>good<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2254>you<s%> from <S%G3771>heaven<s%> <S%G5205>rains<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2593>fruitful<s%> <S%G1705>seasons<s%>, filling <S%G2257>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> with <S%G5160>food<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2540>gladness<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G3004>sayings<s%> <S%G3433>scarce<s%> restrained <S%G2664>they<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G3361>from<s%> <S%G3361>doing<s%> <S%G2380>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> there came <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1904>thither<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> having <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%>, <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3034>stoned<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, and <S%G4951>dragged<s%> him out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G3543>supposing<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2348>dead<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> as the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> stood round <S%G2944>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he rose <S%G450>up<s%>, and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> on the <S%G1887>morrow<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> forth <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had preached the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G3100>made<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G5290>disciples<s%>, they returned <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2430>Iconium<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G490>Antioch<s%>,

confirming <S%G1991><s%> the <S%G5590>souls<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, exhorting <S%G3870>them<s%> to <S%G1696>continue<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had <S%G5500>appointed<s%> for <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> in <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>, and had <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3521>fasting<s%>, they <S%G3908>commended<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they had <S%G4100>believed<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> they passed <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G4099>Pisidia<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3828>Pamphylia<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%>, they went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G825>Attalia<s%>;

and <S%G2547>thence<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, from <S%G3606>whence<s%> they had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G3860>committed<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they were <S%G3854>come<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%>, they <S%G312>rehearsed<s%> all things <S%G3745>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> unto the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they tarried1304, 1563 <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.
